cz.ive.gui
Class LogFilter

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  cz.ive.gui.LogFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class LogFilter
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Panel with group of checkboxes. Chechbox for each type of logmessage. When filter configuration changes, models of trees and models of tables with messages are modified.

Author:
Zdenek
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

LogFilter

private LogFilter()
Private constructor. LogFilter can't be used without defining models.

LogFilter

public LogFilter(MessageModel model,
                 LogModel[] models,
                 AllMessagesModel allModel)
Creates LogFilter - group of checkboxes. Filter of logmessages.

Parameters:
model - model of table with messages from one node
models - array of tree model
allModel - model with allmessages
